Loading on specific target architectures

The Fujitsu eval boards use a host-based terminal program to load and execute programs on the target. This program, pciuh, is relatively new and it replaces the previous ROM monitor, which had the shell in the ROM.

To use the GDB remote serial protocol to communicate with a SPARClite board, link your programs with the "stub" module `sparc-stub.c'; this module manages the communication with GDB. See section `The GDB remote serial protocol' in Debugging with GDB, for more details.
